original_text: for sin indeed was in the world before the law was given, but sin is not counted where there is no law.
korean_text: 죄가 율법 있기 전에도 세상에 있었으나 율법이 없었을 때에는 죄를 죄로 여기지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: for sin indeed was in the world before the law was given
sentences.korean_translation: 죄는 실로 율법이 주어지기 전에 세상에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: but sin is not counted where there is no law
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 율법이 없는 곳에서는 죄로 여기지 않습니다
